title: Symbolizing the champions and reworks this year so far.
body:
Swain - Commandment
Kai'sa - Survival
Irelia - Redemption
Pyke - Revenge
Aatrox - Wrath
Akali - Perseverance
Nunu - Adventure
Ezreal - Flare
Neeko - Curiosity

My list (not as eloquent as yours, but w/e):
 Swain - Knowledge is power
Irelia - Vengeance
 Pyke - Uncaring distribution of karma
 Aatrox - Self-hatred
 Akali - The end justifies the means (also applies to Swain)
 Nunu - Friendship
 Ezreal - Flair (you spelled it wrong in your post :P)
Neeko - Curiosity

Dunno if I agree with Irelia, Akali, and Ezreal.
Irelia definitely symbolizes courage. Her whole story revolves around her taking up her broken crest in the face of a massive disaster and standing up to the enemy despite her own risk of death, and winning. She could also symbolize perseverance, but she's mostly the paragon of courage.

Akali is straight up about rebellion. She saw how her order worked, said "Nah bro," and left it, and actively defied everything she's ever learned to go out into the world and do things her way.

Ezreal does have flair, yes, but he encapsulates confidence more than flair. He's overly confident in his abilities and his capabilities to a fault, so it fits him.

flair
noun UK ​  /fleər/ US ​  /fler/
​
C1 [ S ] natural ability to do something well:

He has a flair for languages.
​
C2 [ U ] a situation in which something is done in an exciting and interesting way:

flare
verb UK ​  /fleər/ US ​  /fler/
flare verb (BURN BRIGHTLY)
​
[ I ] to burn brightly either for a short time or not regularly:

The flame above the oil well flared (up) into the dark sky.
